data.eml:eml: Palaearctic Hoplitis bees of the subgenus Platosmia (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Müller, Andreas (2015): Palaearctic Hoplitis bees of the subgenus Platosmia (Megachilidae, Osmiini): biology, taxonomy and key to species. Zootaxa 3936 (1): 71-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.1.3
